content.title: Award to Scheduled Castes Students Who Secured Top Ranks at State and District Level in Standard X & XII (Sahuji Maharaj Assistance)
content.details: The scheme 'Award to Scheduled Castes Students Who Secured Top Ranks at State and District Level in Standard X & XII' is initiated by the Director Scheduled Caste Welfare, Department of Social Justice & Empowerment, Government of Gujarat. Under the scheme, the Scheduled Castes Category students who have Secured Top Ranks at the State and District Levels in Gujarat in Standard X & XII are given cash prizes. Cash prizes are awarded to the first three students who secure the highest ranks in both Standard X and Standard XII across all streams.
benefits: Cash prizes for top rankers in Standard X and XII at both state and district levels.
eligibility: The students should belong to the Scheduled Castes Category of Gujarat.
The students who have Secured Top Ranks at the State and District Levels in Gujarat in Standard X & Standard XII across all streams are eligible for cash prizes.
content.application_process: Offline. Under this scheme, the list of students is obtained from the Gujarat Secondary and Higher Secondary Board and the award is given to the selected students accordingly.
documents_required: Caste Certificate from the Competent Authorities

faqs.question: Who initiated this scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is initiated by the Director Scheduled Caste Welfare, Department of Social Justice & Empowerment, Government of Gujarat.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Cash prizes are awarded to students who secure the highest ranks in both Standard X and Standard XII across all streams at both state and district levels.

faqs.question: What are the award details for state-level rankers?
faqs.answer: For Standard X, the first three students receive ₹41,000/-, ₹21,000/-, and ₹11,000/-. For Standard XII, the prizes are ₹31,000/-, ₹21,000/-, and ₹11,000/- respectively.

faqs.question: What are the award details for district-level rankers?
faqs.answer: For Standard X, the first three students receive ₹6,000/-, ₹5,000/-, and ₹4,000/-. For Standard XII, the prizes are ₹6,000/-, ₹5,000/-, and ₹4,000/- respectively.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for these cash prizes?
faqs.answer: Students belonging to the Scheduled Castes Category of Gujarat who secure top ranks at both state and district levels in Standard X & XII exams are eligible.

faqs.question: Are there any income limits for eligibility?
faqs.answer: No, there is no income limit for eligibility under this scheme.

faqs.question: How can students avail the benefits of this scheme?
faqs.answer: The list of eligible students is obtained from the Gujarat Secondary and Higher Secondary Board, and cash awards are given to selected students accordingly.

faqs.question: How are the winners selected?
faqs.answer: Winners are selected based on their rankings provided by the Gujarat Secondary and Higher Secondary Board.
